pageProduct.name: Silicea Silica Advance 90 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Silica ADVANCE is our NEW 5x multivitamin and mineral formula to support teeth, bones, joint  cartilage, connective tissue as well as healthy skin, hair and nails. It helps support strong bone mass and assists with calcium assimilation in the body to help reduce the risk of bone density loss.

Each capsule contains:

Silica "Natures Building Block" (Supporting tendons and ligaments throughout the body)
Vitamin D3 "The Sun Vitamin". Also helps with calcium assimilation in the body.
Vitamin C . Helps in the formation of collagen and elastin in the skin.
Manganese Beneficial to healthy bone structure and bone metabolism. It is an antioxidant that seeks out the free radicals in the human body.
Calcium (helps maintain good bone health). A diet deficient in calcium can lead to osteoporosis in later life.
Great value new formula… with a whole month’s supply per box! (90 capsules).

No yeast, gluten, dairy product, soy or preservatives. Suitable for Vegetarians,  RDI(*) influenced formula.

Made in Germany.
Available now!

Directions:
Adults and children over 12 years of age take 3 capsules daily, swallowed whole, with a glass of water.
